name: Practiced Leadership
text: When you and your cohort are both members of the same organization, you needn’t shoulder the burden of leadership alone. By relying on the authority of your shared organization as well as your own leadership skills, your cohort demonstrates improved devotion and tactical acumen.
prerequisites: Leadership, membership in the same organization as your cohort.
benefit:
As long as you and your cohort maintain membership in good standing within the same organization, your cohort gains a +4 morale bonus on Will saves against enchantment spells and effects. Additionally, your cohort is treated as though she possessed the same teamwork feats you do for the purpose of determining whether you receive a bonus from your teamwork feats. Your cohort doesn’t receive any bonuses from these feats unless she actually possesses the feats.

If you and your cohort belong to one of the organizations listed in this section, your cohort gains the practiced leadership benefit associated with your organization. If a benefit grants your cohort access to a spell-like ability, the caster level of the effect is 1st or equal to your cohort’s caster level, whichever is higher.
text_zh: 当你和你的部属都是同一个组织的成员时，你就不必独自承担领导的重任。通过依赖于你们共同组织的权威以及你们自己的领导技能，你们的团队表现出了更好的奉献精神和战术敏锐性。
prerequisites_zh: 领导力，与你的部属在同一组织中的成员资格。
benefit_zh:
只要你和你的部属在同一个组织中保持良好的成员关系，你的同伴在对抗惑控系法术和效果的意志豁免上获得+4士气加值。此外，为了确定你是否能从团队专长中获得加值，你的同事会被视为拥有与你相同的团队专长。你的队友不会从这些专长中获得任何奖励，除非她真的拥有这些专长。

如果您和您的部属属于本节中列出的组织之一，您的部属将获得与您的组织相关的熟练领导者优势。如果你的部属获得了类法术能力，施法者等级是1或者等于你的部属施法者等级，两者以较高的为准。
